trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> properties that define the appearance of the Continue button on the Success view of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对定义 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 控件“成功”视图上“继续”按钮外观的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 属性集的引用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the appearance of the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 一个定义“继续”按钮外观的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于使用自定义项的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting
trans-unit.target: 设置

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The color of the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 继续按钮的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。

trans-unit.source: The color of the border around the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 继续按钮的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。

trans-unit.source: The style of the border around the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 继续按钮的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`.
trans-unit.target: 该样式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。

trans-unit.source: The default is `"NotSet"`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。

trans-unit.source: Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.
trans-unit.target: 某些样式不清楚地出现除非`BorderWidth`值是否大于 2。

trans-unit.source: The width of the border around the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 继续按钮的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 用于呈现继续按钮的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

trans-unit.source: If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定其他设置，它们将覆盖样式表设置。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Continue button text in bold type.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要以粗体显示继续按钮文本。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Continue button text in italic type.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要以斜体显示继续按钮文本。

trans-unit.source: The name of the font face.
trans-unit.target: 字体的名称。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Continue button text with a line above it.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要显示带它上面的行的继续按钮文本。

trans-unit.source: The size of the text in the Continue button as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.
trans-unit.target: 中的继续按钮的文本的大小<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>对象。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Continue button text as crossed out.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要显示继续按钮文本为带删除线。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Continue button text with an underline.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要显示带下划线的继续按钮文本。

trans-unit.source: The color of the text in the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 继续按钮中文本的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the height of the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> ，它表示继续按钮的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the width of the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示继续按钮的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed on the Continue button on the Success view of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控件“成功”视图中“继续”按钮上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 要在“继续”按钮上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Continue".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“Continue”。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button to use when rendering the Continue button for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置呈现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控件的“继续”按钮时所使用的按钮类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> object that defines the type of button to render for the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 一个定义“继续”按钮的呈现类型的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The property value can be one of the three <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> enumeration values: <see langword="Button" />, <see langword="Image" />, or <see langword="Link" />.
trans-unit.target: 属性值可能是以下三个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 枚举值之一：<see langword="Button" />、<see langword="Image" /> 和 <see langword="Link" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Button" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Button" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonType%2A> property gets or sets the type (`Button`, `Image`, or `Link)` of the change password button to use when rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonType%2A>属性获取或设置的类型 (`Button`， `Image`，或`Link)`呈现时要使用更改密码按钮的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page that the user will see after clicking the Continue button on the Success view.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单击“成功”视图中的“继续”按钮后将显示给用户的页面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the page the user is redirected to after clicking the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 单击“继续”按钮后将用户重定向到的页面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A> property contains the URL of the Web page that users will see after successfully changing their password.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>属性包含该用户已成功更改其密码后看到的网页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>, you can control the first page that users see after changing their password.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>，你可以控制用户更改其密码后看到的第一页。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A> property is the default, an <xref:System.String.Empty> field, when the user clicks the Continue button, the page is refreshed and any values on the form are cleared.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>属性是默认情况下，<xref:System.String.Empty>字段中，当用户单击继续按钮，刷新页面，而且该窗体上的任何值将被清除。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Creates the individual controls that make up the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control in preparation for posting back or rendering.
trans-unit.target: 分别创建组成 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控件的各个控件，以便为回发或呈现做准备。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CreateChildControls%2A> method creates instances of the controls that make up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control and creates default event handlers for their events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CreateChildControls%2A>方法创建的控件的构成实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制并创建为它们的事件的事件处理程序的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />, the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate" /> contains a control that implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl" /> interface, and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> property of the control is set to "UserName".
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate" /> 就包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl" /> 属性设置为“UserName”的实现 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 接口的控件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />, the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate" /> does not contain a control that implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl" /> interface, and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> property of the control is set to "UserName".
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />，<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate" /> 就不包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl" /> 属性设置为“UserName”的实现 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 接口的控件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate" /> does not contain a control that implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl" /> interface, and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> property of the control is set to "CurrentPassword".
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate" /> 不包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl" /> 属性设置为“CurrentPassword”的实现 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 接口的控件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate" /> does not contain a control that implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl" /> interface, and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> property of the control is set to "NewPassword".
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate" /> 不包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl" /> 属性设置为“NewPassword”的实现 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 接口的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to display next to the link to the Web page that contains a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> control for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在链接旁显示的图像的 URL，该链接指向含有网站 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> 控件的网页。

trans-unit.source: The URL of an image to display next to the link to the Web page that contains a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> control for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 在链接旁显示的图像的 URL，该链接指向含有网站 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> 控件的网页。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the link to the Web page that contains a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> control for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置链接的文本，该链接指向含有网站 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> 控件的网页。

trans-unit.source: The text to display next to the link to the Web page that contains a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> control for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 在链接旁显示的文本，该链接指向含有网站 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> 控件的网页。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the Web page that contains a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> control for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置含有网站 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> 控件的网页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the Web page that contains a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> control for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 含有网站 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> 控件的网页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current password for the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户的当前密码。

trans-unit.source: The current password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户输入的当前密码。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A> property contains the current password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A>属性包含当前由用户输入的密码。

trans-unit.source: Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 通过 HTTP 传输密码是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users.
trans-unit.target: 可以查看或受到恶意用户 HTTP 传输。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高安全性，使用登录控件时，你应使用 HTTPS 协议的安全套接字层 (SSL) 加密来确保不能在回发期间读取用户的密码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, and includes a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event named `ChangingPassword`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件，并包含的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>事件名为`ChangingPassword`。

trans-unit.source: The code in the `ChangingPassword` handler compares the old password stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A> property to the new password stored in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPassword%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 中的代码`ChangingPassword`处理程序比较中存储的旧密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A>属性中存储的新密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPassword%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个密码都相同的更改的密码将失败。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to `true` to enable users to enter their user name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>属性`true`以便用户可以输入其用户名。

trans-unit.source: This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着用户不必登录要查看的页面。

trans-unit.source: The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定 ASP.NET Web 站点已配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你已知其名称和密码，创建用户。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control should display the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName" /> control and label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控件是否应显示 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName" /> 控件和标签的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control should display the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控件应显示 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In order to change their password, users must be authenticated by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改其密码，用户必须进行身份验证的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: To allow users who are not logged on to change their password, or to be authenticated by the membership provider with a different user account and then change the password for that account, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control can display a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control to accept the user name.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许用户登录不更改其密码，或可以由其他用户帐户的成员资格提供程序进行身份验证，然后将更改该帐户的密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件可以显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件能够接受用户名称。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control will be displayed to users who are not logged on; otherwise, the user will not be able to specify a user name.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>属性`true`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件显示的用户未登录，否则，用户将不能指定用户名。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> control to users who are not logged on to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>属性显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>控件添加到用户未登录到网站。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, and includes a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event named `ChangingPassword`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件，并包含的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>事件名为`ChangingPassword`。

trans-unit.source: The code in the `ChangingPassword` handler compares the old password stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A> property to the new password stored in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPassword%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 中的代码`ChangingPassword`处理程序比较中存储的旧密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A>属性中存储的新密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPassword%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个密码都相同的更改的密码将失败。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>属性`true`，使用户能够输入其用户名。

trans-unit.source: This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着用户不必登录要查看的页面。

trans-unit.source: The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定 ASP.NET Web 站点已配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你已知其名称和密码，创建用户。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.FailureTextStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于使用自定义项的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting
trans-unit.target: 设置

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The color that appears behind the error message text.
trans-unit.target: 显示错误消息文本的背景的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。

trans-unit.source: The color of the border around the error message text.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息文本的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。

trans-unit.source: The style of the border around the error message text.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息文本的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`.
trans-unit.target: 该样式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。

trans-unit.source: The default is `"NotSet"`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。

trans-unit.source: Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.
trans-unit.target: 某些样式不清楚地出现除非`BorderWidth`值是否大于 2。

trans-unit.source: The width of the border around the error message text.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息文本的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the error message text.
trans-unit.target: 用于呈现错误消息文本的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

trans-unit.source: If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定其他设置，它们将覆盖样式表设置。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the error message text in bold type.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要以粗体显示的错误消息文本。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the error message text in italic type.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要以斜体显示的错误消息文本。

trans-unit.source: The name of the font face.
trans-unit.target: 字体的名称。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the error message text with a line above it.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要显示其上一条线的错误消息文本。

trans-unit.source: The size of the text in the error message as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.
trans-unit.target: 形式的错误消息中的文本的大小<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>对象。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the error message text as crossed out.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要为带删除线显示错误消息文本。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the error message text with an underline.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要显示带下划线的错误消息文本。

trans-unit.source: The color of the text in the error message text.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息文本中的文本颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the height of the error message text.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示错误消息文本的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the width of the error message text.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示错误消息文本的宽度。

trans-unit.source: If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定其他设置，它们将覆盖样式表设置。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the instructional text in bold type.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要以粗体显示的说明性文本。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the instructional text in italic type.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要以斜体显示的说明文本。

trans-unit.source: The name of the font face.
trans-unit.target: 字体的名称。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the instructional text with a line above it.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要显示带它上面的行的说明文本。

trans-unit.source: The size of the text in the instructional text as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.
trans-unit.target: 中的说明文本的文本的大小<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>对象。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the instructional text as crossed out.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要为带删除线显示的说明文本。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the instructional text with an underline.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要显示带下划线的说明性文本。

trans-unit.source: The color of the text in the instructional text.
trans-unit.target: 中的说明文本的文本颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the height of the instructional text.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示说明的文本的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the width of the instructional text.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示说明性文本的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> objects that define the appearance of text box labels on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对定义 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 控件上文本框标签外观的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 对象集的引用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> properties that define the appearance of text box labels on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象，其中包含定义 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 控件上文本框标签外观的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.LabelStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于使用自定义项的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.LabelStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting
trans-unit.target: 设置

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The color behind the text box labels.
trans-unit.target: 文本框标签的背景色。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。

trans-unit.source: The color of the border around the text box labels.
trans-unit.target: 文本标签周围边框的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。

trans-unit.source: The style of the border around the text box labels.
trans-unit.target: 文本标签周围边框的样式。

trans-unit.source: The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`.
trans-unit.target: 该样式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。

trans-unit.source: The default is `"NotSet"`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。

trans-unit.source: Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.
trans-unit.target: 某些样式不清楚地出现除非`BorderWidth`值是否大于 2。

trans-unit.source: The width of the border around the text box labels.
trans-unit.target: 文本标签周围边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the text box labels.
trans-unit.target: 用于呈现框标签的文本的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

trans-unit.source: If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定其他设置，它们将覆盖样式表设置。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the text box labels text in bold type.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要以粗体显示的文本标签文本。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the text box labels text in italic type.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要以斜体显示的文本标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The name of the font face.
trans-unit.target: 字体的名称。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the text box labels text with a line above it.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要显示其上一条线的文本标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The size of the text in the text box labels as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.
trans-unit.target: 为文本框标签中的文本的大小<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>对象。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the text box labels text as crossed out.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要显示文本框中，请为带删除线标签文本。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the text box labels text with an underline.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要显示带下划线的文本标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The color of the text in the text box labels.
trans-unit.target: 文本框标签中文本的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the height of the text box labels.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> ，它表示文本框标签的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the width of the text box labels.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示文本框标签的宽度。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示要还原的控件状态。

trans-unit.source: Restores control state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SaveControlState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 可从 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SaveControlState" /> 方法保存的上一个页请求还原控件状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.LoadControlState%2A> method when you need to specify how a custom server control restores its control state.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.LoadControlState%2A>方法时需要指定自定义服务器控件还原其控件状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Server Control Custom State Management](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96f79173-9d1a-4bde-bf34-1032ebbbe5a9).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[服务器控制自定义状态管理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96f79173-9d1a-4bde-bf34-1032ebbbe5a9)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示要还原的控件状态。

trans-unit.source: Restores view state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SaveViewState" /> 方法保存的上一个页请求还原视图状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.LoadViewState%2A> method when you need to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.LoadViewState%2A>方法时需要指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Server Control Custom State Management](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96f79173-9d1a-4bde-bf34-1032ebbbe5a9).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[服务器控制自定义状态管理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96f79173-9d1a-4bde-bf34-1032ebbbe5a9)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="savedState" /> parameter cannot be resolved to a valid <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" />.
trans-unit.target: 无法将 <paramref name="savedState" /> 参数解析为有效的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the email message that is sent to users after they have changed their password.
trans-unit.target: 获取对一个属性集合的引用，这些属性定义了用户更改其密码后会接收到的电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition" /> object that defines the email message sent to a new user.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition" />对象，用于定义电子邮件发送给新用户。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A> property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define the format and content of the email message sent to users after they have changed their password.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A>属性返回对一组属性，用于定义的格式和更改其密码后，向用户发送电子邮件消息的内容的引用。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括的主题行和发件人的寄信人地址。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of properties, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的属性列表，请参见 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A>属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties in the form *property*`-`*subproperty*, where *subproperty* represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中设置这些属性*属性*`-`*子属性*，其中*子属性*表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>类 （对于示例中， `MailDefinition-Subject`)。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form *Property*`.`*Subproperty* (for example,`MailDefinition.Subject`).
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体中*属性*`.`*子属性*(例如，`MailDefinition.Subject`)。

trans-unit.source: An email message is sent only if the user has an email address registered with the membership provider and if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A> property points to a valid file.
trans-unit.target: 仅当用户具有向成员资格提供程序注册的电子邮件地址发送电子邮件和如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A>属性指向有效的文件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From%2A> property must be set to an email address; otherwise, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From%2A>属性必须设置为电子邮件地址; 否则为<xref:System.Web.HttpException>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If the email message is created from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object, it will make the substitutions shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 如果电子邮件消息创建从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象，它将使以下表所示的替换。

trans-unit.source: The substitution text is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 替换文本不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Substitution text
trans-unit.target: 替换文本

trans-unit.source: Replaced with
trans-unit.target: 替换为

trans-unit.source: The Web site user name of the user.
trans-unit.target: 网站用户的用户的名称。

trans-unit.source: The new password for the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户的新密码。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML-encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象是`true`，邮件消息的内容将使用 HTML 编码，以便为消息接收方防止跨站点脚本的安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SendingMail> event to modify the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage> object that is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SendingMail>事件来修改<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage>对象创建的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象。

trans-unit.source: Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 发送用户帐户名称或电子邮件中的密码是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件通常以纯文本发送，并可以由"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。

trans-unit.source: To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c).
trans-unit.target: 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解措施[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A> property to define an email message that is sent to users who change their passwords.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A>属性来定义电子邮件发送到用户更改其密码。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that there is a file called `MailFile.txt` that contains the text of the email message to send.
trans-unit.target: 它假设存在名为的文件`MailFile.txt`，其中包含要发送的电子邮件消息的文本。

trans-unit.source: To be able to send email messages to users, you must configure an email server in the Web.config file for your application.
trans-unit.target: 若要能够向用户发送电子邮件，你必须配置电子邮件服务器的 Web.config 文件中你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From" /> property is not set to an email address.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From" /> 属性未设置为电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider that is used to manage member information.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于管理成员信息的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is the membership provider for the application.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为应用程序的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property gets or sets the membership provider that is used to look up member information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>属性获取或设置用于查找成员信息的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property is `null` or empty, the default membership provider, `AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`, is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>属性是`null`或该表为空，默认成员资格提供程序， `AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`，使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the membership providers available to ASP.NET applications, see [Membership Providers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f).
trans-unit.target: 有关对 ASP.NET 应用程序可用的成员资格提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[成员资格提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)。

trans-unit.source: The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the membership provider in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 新密码必须满足设置中的成员资格提供程序的最低要求<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the password does not meet these requirements, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果密码不满足这些要求，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户输入的新密码。

trans-unit.source: The new password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入的新密码。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPassword%2A> property contains the new password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPassword%2A>属性包含用户输入的新密码。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to define the requirements for the new password.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性来定义新的密码要求。

trans-unit.source: This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side.
trans-unit.target: 此正则表达式用于强制执行客户端上的密码规则。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>可以在数据存储级别配置的密码强制无关。

trans-unit.source: The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 密码必须满足设置的最小要求在<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the password does not meet these requirements, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果密码不满足这些要求，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 通过 HTTP 传输密码是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users.
trans-unit.target: 可以查看或受到恶意用户 HTTP 传输。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高安全性，使用登录控件时，你应使用 HTTPS 协议的安全套接字层 (SSL) 加密来确保不能在回发期间读取用户的密码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, and includes a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event named `ChangingPassword`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件，并包含的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>事件名为`ChangingPassword`。

trans-unit.source: `ChangingPassword` compares the old password stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A> property to the new password stored in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPassword%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `ChangingPassword` 比较中存储的旧密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A>属性中存储的新密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPassword%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If they are the same, changing the password fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果它们是相同的更改的密码将失败。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>属性`true`，使用户能够输入其用户名。

trans-unit.source: This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着用户不必登录要查看的页面。

trans-unit.source: The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定 ASP.NET Web 站点已配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你已知其名称和密码，创建用户。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the label text for the New Password text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置“新密码”文本框的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The text to display next to the New Password text box.
trans-unit.target: 在“新密码”文本框旁显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "New Password:".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“新密码:”。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the regular expression that is used to validate the password provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于验证用户输入的密码的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression string used to validate the new password provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用于验证用户输入的新密码的正则表达式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to define the requirements for passwords that are used to validate user accounts on your Web site.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性来定义用于验证您的网站上的用户帐户的密码要求。

trans-unit.source: This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side.
trans-unit.target: 此正则表达式用于强制执行客户端上的密码规则。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>可以在数据存储级别配置的密码强制无关。

trans-unit.source: The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 密码必须满足设置的最小要求在<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the password does not meet these requirements, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果密码不满足这些要求，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: To display requirements to the user, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.PasswordHintText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要向用户显示要求，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.PasswordHintText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the password entered does not pass the regular expression contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的密码没有通过正则表达式中包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性、 中包含的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>向用户显示属性。

trans-unit.source: If the password is rejected by the membership provider, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordFailureText%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果密码被拒绝的成员资格提供程序中, 所包含的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordFailureText%2A>属性显示。

trans-unit.source: A common use of password standards is to force users to select strong passwords.
trans-unit.target: 密码标准的一个常见用途是强制用户选择强密码。

trans-unit.source: As a best practice, enforce password rules at the data level in the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 作为最佳做法，强制执行在成员资格提供程序中的数据级别的密码规则。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property allows for the convenience of checking the password on the client side, but does not lock out users who make repeated attempts to log on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性允许为检查是否有客户端上的密码的方便起见，但不在锁住进行重复的用户尝试登录。

trans-unit.source: To improve security, configure your membership provider to restrict the number of attempts a user may make to log on.
trans-unit.target: 若要提高安全性，配置你的成员资格提供程序，以限制用户可尝试登录的尝试次数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护成员资格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性来定义正则表达式，用于检查密码以确保它们满足以下条件：

trans-unit.source: Are greater than six characters.
trans-unit.target: 是大于六个字符。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one digit.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一个数字。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。

trans-unit.source: The password requirements contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.PasswordHintText%2A> property are displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的密码要求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.PasswordHintText%2A>属性显示给用户。

trans-unit.source: If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户输入的密码不满足条件，文本将包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>向用户显示属性。

trans-unit.source: If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果不输入新密码中, 所包含的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>向用户显示属性。

trans-unit.source: The new password must also meet the minimum requirements set by the in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 新密码还必须满足设置的最小要求在<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the password does not meet these requirements, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果密码不满足这些要求，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message that is shown when the password entered does not pass the regular expression criteria defined in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当所输入的密码不符合 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression" /> 属性中定义的正则表达式验证条件时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The error message shown when the password entered does not pass the regular expression defined in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 当所输入的密码不符合 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression" /> 属性中定义的正则表达式验证条件时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property to inform the user that the password entered does not pass the regular expression defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>属性以通知用户输入的密码没有通过中定义的正则表达式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>可以在数据存储级别配置的密码强制无关。

trans-unit.source: The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 新密码必须符合设置的最小要求在<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the password does not meet these requirements, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果密码不满足这些要求，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性来定义正则表达式，用于检查密码以确保它们满足以下条件：

trans-unit.source: Are greater than six characters.
trans-unit.target: 是大于六个字符。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one digit.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一个数字。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。

trans-unit.source: The password requirements contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.PasswordHintText%2A> property are displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的密码要求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.PasswordHintText%2A>属性显示给用户。

trans-unit.source: If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户输入的密码不满足条件，文本将包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>向用户显示属性。

trans-unit.source: If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果不输入新密码中, 所包含的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>向用户显示属性。

trans-unit.source: The new password must also meet the minimum requirements set by the in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 新密码还必须满足设置的最小要求在<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the password does not meet these requirements, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果密码不满足这些要求，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message that is displayed when the user leaves the New Password text box empty.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当用户将“新密码”文本框留空时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The error message to display if the user leaves the New Password text box empty.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将“新密码”文本框留空时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default is "New Password is required."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为：必须填写新密码。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性来定义正则表达式，用于检查密码以确保它们满足以下条件：

trans-unit.source: Are greater than six characters.
trans-unit.target: 是大于六个字符。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one digit.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一个数字。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。

trans-unit.source: The password requirements contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.PasswordHintText%2A> property are displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的密码要求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.PasswordHintText%2A>属性显示给用户。

trans-unit.source: If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户输入的密码不满足条件，文本将包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>向用户显示属性。

trans-unit.target: 如果不输入新密码中, 所包含的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>向用户显示属性。

trans-unit.source: The new password must also meet the minimum requirements set by the in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 新密码还必须满足设置的最小要求在<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the password does not meet these requirements, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果密码不满足这些要求，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control is passed up the Web server control hierarchy for the page.
trans-unit.target: 确定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控件的事件是否沿页面的 Web 服务器控件层次结构向上传递。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已被取消，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control contains child controls for the Change Password and Success views.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件包含更改密码和成功视图的子控件。

trans-unit.source: Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are bubbled (that is, they are sent to the naming container).
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的控件中的事件冒泡而不是单独引发事件的每个按钮，（即，它们会发送到命名的容器）。

trans-unit.source: The naming container in turn raises a generic event called `ItemCommand` with parameter values that allow you to determine which individual control raised the original event.
trans-unit.target: 命名容器反过来引发调用的泛型事件`ItemCommand`使用允许你确定哪一个控件引发了原始事件的参数值。

trans-unit.source: By responding to this single event, you can avoid writing event-handling methods for individual child controls.
trans-unit.target: 通过对此单个事件做出反应，可以避免编写各个子控件的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonClick" /> event when a user clicks the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击“取消”按钮时引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonClick" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword" /> event after the password is changed.
trans-unit.target: 更改密码后引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangedPassword%2A> method is called after the password is changed by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangedPassword%2A>方法调用中指定的成员资格提供程序通过更改密码后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangedPassword%2A> method is called, the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangedPassword%2A>调用方法时，将发生以下情况：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control attempts to send an email message to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件尝试向用户发送电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: The user is either redirected to the Web site specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property or the control template specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 用户被重定向到中指定的网站<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessPageUrl%2A>属性或控件模板中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A>属性显示。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangedPassword%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangedPassword%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangedPassword(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangedPassword(System.EventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangedPassword(System.EventArgs)" />方法在派生类中，一定要调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangedPassword(System.EventArgs)" />方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError" /> event when the user's password is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 用户密码未更改时引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangePasswordError%2A> method is called when the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property encounters an error while attempting to change the user's password.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangePasswordError%2A>中指定的成员资格提供程序时，调用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>属性在尝试更改用户的密码时遇到错误。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object does not indicate the reason why changing the password failed, only that the password was not changed.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>对象不表示更改的密码失败的原因，仅的原因，未更改密码。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangePasswordError%2A> method to perform a custom action when the user's password is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangePasswordError%2A>方法来执行自定义操作，当用户的密码未发生更改。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangePasswordError%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangePasswordError%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangePasswordError(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangePasswordError(System.EventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangePasswordError(System.EventArgs)" />方法在派生类中，一定要调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangePasswordError(System.EventArgs)" />方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> object containing the event data.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword" /> event before the user's password is changed by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 在成员资格提供程序更改用户的密码之前引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword%2A> method is called before the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property is called to change the user's password.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword%2A>方法调用中指定的成员资格提供程序之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>属性调用以更改用户的密码。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword%2A> method to perform any processing that is necessary before changing the password, such as checking the new password to make sure it is not in a list of common passwords.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword%2A>方法来执行，才能更改密码，例如检查新的密码，以确保它的任何处理不是列表中的常见的密码。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword%2A> method can cancel the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> object passed as the *e* parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword%2A>方法可以取消<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>事件通过设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>对象作为传递*e*参数`true`。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, and includes a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event named `ChangingPassword`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件，并包含的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>事件名为`ChangingPassword`。

trans-unit.source: `ChangingPassword` compares the old password stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A> property to the new password stored in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPassword%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `ChangingPassword` 比较中存储的旧密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A>属性中存储的新密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPassword%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个密码都相同的更改的密码将失败。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>属性`true`，使用户能够输入其用户名。

trans-unit.source: This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着用户不必登录要查看的页面。

trans-unit.source: The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you.
